metadata.title: Tuesday, 13th December, 2022
metadata.session: SECOND SESSION OF THE THIRTEENTH ASSEMBLY

questions.minister: Minister of Infrastructure, Housing and Urban Development
parts: (a) when the construction of the Kalense Toll Plaza on the Kasama - Luwinguroad will be completed;
(b) what the cause of the delay in completing the project is; and
(c) what the cost of the outstanding works is.
(a) whether the Government has any plans to upgrade the Mongu Airport to enable it accommodate commercial aeroplanes; and
(b) if so, when the plans will be implemented.
(a) whether the Government has any plans to construct a subordinate court in Nyimba District;
(b) if so, when the plans will be implemented; and
(c) if there are no such plans, why.
(a) whether the Government has any plans to construct a Level I Hospital in Katete District; and
(b) if so, when the plans will be implemented.
(a) whether the Government has any plans to resuscitate the following institutions in Magoye Parliamentary Constituency:
(i) Magoye Research Institute; and (ii) Magoye Cotton Development Trust; and
(b) if there are no such plans, why.
